ygData.subject: RE: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I think faction plays a bigger role than cha, cause my CHA is the base barbarian 55 or something and I got them for 87 in freeport ... From:	Brett P Gillmore
ygData.messageBody:
I think faction plays a bigger role than cha, cause my CHA is the base
barbarian 55 or something and I got them for 87 in freeport

-----Original Message-----
From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 8:54 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor

From: "Brett P Gillmore" <bgillmor@...>



hmm well out in west commons we checked Nora Sparkles with
my friend the
bard(cha 110) and using the faction increasing song still
got a quote of 132
plat for the star rubies. Maybe she charges more out there
then the other
merchants..
